info.name: Pixeljoint.com - Colored Darkness
info.description:
Pixeljoint.com

06/29/2010 - This theme is outdated, but still kind of works.

It's dark, and it has a few colors.  The text logo is taken from the "Hello Darkness" theme that's available at the site.
info.additionalInfo:
=====================
7/18/09 - Fixed the tabs when viewing someone's profile.
7/27/09 - Added a BG color to submissions + image posted on the forum (.zoom), for those images that have transparency.  Darkened the border colors of the forums.
